enhanced_description: HackerTrail is an HR technology solution launched in 2014, headquartered in Singapore, that revolutionizes tech job searches and recruitment globally. It empowers candidates from over 80 countries to find roles matching their strengths and preferences through its proprietary skill-matching technology and personalized approach. For clients, HackerTrail aims to boost hiring manager confidence and productivity by providing access to a global talent pool. Key features include 'Scout', an AI-powered sourcing tool for finding top tech talent faster, 'Litmus', an assessment platform ensuring skill-assured matches and qualified candidates, and 'Purple Squirrel', an exclusive club for tech industry collaboration and knowledge sharing. With over 120 clients across 5 cities, HackerTrail serves companies of all sizes, from small businesses to large and global enterprises, by disrupting traditional recruitment practices and fostering data-driven hiring.
